summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll (Comptroller's File No. 224687) for the construction, reconstruction and/or repair of concrete sidewalks in front of certain property, levying and assessing the amount shown on said assessment roll, creating and establishing Local Improvement District No. 6072, and a local improvement fund therefor, and providing for the method of payment of said assessments and for the issuance and redemption of warrants on said Local Improvement District.
